entry.title: Maschinen Krieger is a very sneaking modelling genre
entry.summary: In my last post I started waffling on about whether models are art/what is artwhether models are art/what is art, which was prompted as a response to [[chris-meddings]] post about the same topic. And then I sent a couple messages back and forth with him on Instagram.

entry.title: Are Models Art?
entry.summary: [[chris-meddings]] recently published a blog post titled Is it Art though?, which really got me thinking about the questions
